DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate addition idelalisib bendamustine/rituximab progression-free survival ( PFS ) adults previously treat indolent non-Hodgkin lymphoma ( iNHL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Idelalisib ( GS-1101 ) Combination With Bendamustine Rituximab Previously Treated Indolent Non-Hodgkin Lymphomas
